Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Cephalothin - induced immune hemolytic anemia .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Cephalothin-induced immune hemolytic anemia |

The disease entity in the paragraph is "Cephalothin-induced immune hemolytic anemia." It is a condition where the immune system attacks and destroys red blood cells, causing anemia, due to an adverse reaction to the antibiotic Cephalothin.
